issue.title: [C++/Python] Add Ubuntu 18.04 / gcc7 as a nightly build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2670](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2670). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once the packaging thread reaches a stable state and we have the ability to run non-packaging nightly tests, we should set up a Docker build on Ubuntu 18.04 (which is based on gcc 7.3) so we can keep that build clean. It may be a while until we have any Travis CI entries that use Bionic / 18.04

comments.body:
